      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AvroSerialiser
      This class is used to serialise and deserialise avro files
      class  DateSerialiser
      Deprecated. 
      this is not very efficient and should only be used for compatibility reasons. For new properties use RawDateSerialiser instead.
      class  DoubleSerialiser
      Deprecated. 
      this is not very efficient and should only be used for compatibility reasons. For new properties use RawDoubleSerialiser instead.
      class  FloatSerialiser
      Deprecated. 
      this is not very efficient and should only be used for compatibility reasons. For new properties use RawFloatSerialiser instead.
      class  FreqMapSerialiser
      A FreqMapSerialiser serialises and deserialises FreqMaps.
      class  IntegerFreqMapSerialiser
      Deprecated. 
      use IntegerFreqMap with FreqMapSerialiser instead.
      class  IntegerSerialiser
      Deprecated. 
      this is not very efficient and should only be used for compatibility reasons. For new properties use CompactRawIntegerSerialiser instead.
      class  LongSerialiser
      Deprecated. 
      this is not very efficient and should only be used for compatibility reasons. For new properties use CompactRawLongSerialiser instead.

    • Uses of Serialisation in uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.serialisation.implementation.raw

      Classes in uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.serialisation.implementation.raw that implement Serialisation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CompactRawIntegerSerialiser
      Serialises integers using a variable-length scheme that means smaller integers get serialised into a smaller number of bytes.
      class  CompactRawLongSerialiser
      Serialises longs using a variable-length scheme that means smaller longs get serialised into a smaller number of bytes.
      class  RawDateSerialiser
      Serialises Dates to an array of bytes of length 8 by directly converting the underlying long to a byte array.
      class  RawDoubleSerialiser
      RawDoubleSerialiser serialises Doubles into an IEEE floating point little-endian byte array.
      class  RawFloatSerialiser
      RawFloatSerialiser serialises Floats into an IEEE floating point little-endian byte array.
      class  RawIntegerSerialiser
      RawIntegerSerialiser serialises Integers into a little-endian byte array.
      class  RawLongSerialiser
      RawLongSerialiser serialises Longs into a little-endian byte array.

    • Uses of Serialisation in uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.sketches.datasketches.frequencies.serialisation

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LongsSketchSerialiser
      A LongsSketchSerialiser serialises a LongsSketch using its toByteArray() method.
      class  StringsSketchSerialiser
      A StringsSketchSerialiser serialises a ItemsSketch of Strings using its toByteArray() method.
